General.Name: Public Joint Stock Oil Company Bashneft
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Oil Company Bashneft engages in the development and implementation, exploration, production, and refining of oil reserves in Russia. The company's primary oil producing regions includes the Volga-Ural province, Timan-Pechora, and Western Siberia. It produces and sells motor fuels. The company was founded in 1932 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint Stock Oil Company Bashneft is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Rosneft Oil Company.
General.Address: St. B. Polyanka, d. 3/9, Moscow, Russia, 119180
